name: Big Catch
description:
Just another day of fishing . . .

Play as a fishercat and catch as many fishes as you want!

Fishes caught can be used to buy upgrades at the shop.

(This game was created for a fictional console, LTRO-1, and it follows the restrictions of Lospec Jam 1)


Controls > Keyboard

Space / L-Mouse : Reel in

L-Alt /  L-Ctrl  : Hold line

Enter  : Open shop

Arrow keys (left, right) / A, D : Move rod

> Controller

A : Reel in

B: Hold line

Start: Open shop

D-pad (Left, right): Move rod

Credits

Creators : turtttle (Programming), thirteenz.zei (Art, music and sfx)

Font: 8-bit HUD by Seba Perez

Sfx: Sfx-01 by Stupidplusplus

(This was suuuper helpful so big shoutout to them! Please give their stuff a look! :D)

Music: Bosca Ceoil
